name: Fallout: Cascadia
summary: Fallout: Cascadia aims to bring the Fallout experience to the Pacific Northwest and let you explore the massive ruins of Seattle, meet the NCR once again, stumble across new enemies and factions, all through the eyes of our new protagonist - the Drifter. The game is centered around the massive ruins of downtown Seattle. The world itself is one of the biggest ones ever seen in the Fallout setting as far as playable space goes with several settlements to visit, massive forests and swamps to traverse and several unique locations all with their own stories. All accompanied by all new quests and enemies.
